text:
Most breathtaking landscapes captured in 2023

Looking for the most breathtaking landscapes captured in 2023? Redditors have shared their top picks, and here are some of the most stunning and unique locations that left them in awe:

Salar de Uyuni, Bolivia

Antarctica

Description : A vast, icy wilderness that feels like another planet.

Quote: "Antarctica is the most otherworldly place on this planet."

Iceland

Socotra, Yemen

Description : Home to unique dragon's blood trees and other endemic species.

Quote: "Socotra in Yemen"

Danakil Depression, Ethiopia

Description : One of the hottest and lowest places on Earth, with colorful hydrothermal lakes.

Quote: "The danakil depression is probably about as close as we can get to walking venus on earth"

Bagan, Myanmar

Description : An ancient city with thousands of Buddhist temples and pagodas.

Quotes: "Bagan, in Myanmar, hosts one of the most fascinating architectural landscapes in the world." "The architecture is beautiful."

Yunnan Province, China

Fiordland National Park, New Zealand

The Alps

Isle of Skye, Scotland

Description : Dramatic landscapes, ancient castles, and charming villages.

Quote: "The Isle of Skye in Scotland. The whole place is beautiful but if I had to narrow it down, I would say my favorite spots there were Loch Coruisk and the Quiraing."

Joshua Tree National Park, USA

Description : Unique desert landscape with the iconic Joshua trees and rock formations.

Quote: "Joshua Tree National Park. It's like the land of Dr Seuss."

Ha Giang, Vietnam

Description : Spectacular mountain views and rice paddies.

Quote: "Ha Giang in northern Vietnam. Took this pic while I was on a 4-day motorbike loop through the region."

Norway

Patagonia, Chile

Death Valley, USA

Description : Extreme desert landscape with vast salt flats, sand dunes, and colorful badlands.

Quote: "Death Valley in California. It went on forever and was so beautiful."

Additional Recommendations

For more personalized recommendations, consider asking in these subreddits:
title: The heart of the internet
